item.description:
Dr. Bob Bowman is bringing his "2008 Patriot Tour" to town!

At the Friends Meeting House located at 901 Pleasant St, Worcester, Mass.
7 pm, Saturday, June 28th.

Tickets: $15 at the door, or $10 in advance, send check payable to "The
Patriots" c/o Dr. T. Conna, 1 Folly Lane, Westboro, MA 01581
For more info call Dr. Ted Conna 508-366-7687

Activist meeting/party also to be held prior to the lecture beginning at 12
pm in Brookfield, Mass. This will be a potluck event. Dr. Bob will be in
attendance as well.

For more info contact Larry at info@centralmass911truth.org

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 2008 Patriot Tour- Dr Bob Bowman
